title: NextJS Fetching Example
summary: Pretty much is an exmple from NextJS official site. It's so easy to set up a page with NextJS, and you can do pre-render at build time using the props returned by `getStaticProps` (in the production mode), and dynamic routes and more

title: Semantic Table Example
summary: With NextJS, Play a component from Semamtic UI React has never been easier. Just copy the code and create a page under 'pages/playground/', and it's ready to go!

title: UseReducer (Redux-Like) with NextJS Example
summary: A simple example to demostrate how to use UseReducer within NextJS

title: ckeditor5-build-classic-dna Demo
summary: My First NPM package :-), actually I did not do much. But I think it's helpful if you want to have inserting image url and adding code block features which do not come with default classic build. Also I will show you how to load CKEditor in NEXTJS with SSR.
